name: Curve Gauge
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://ftm.curve.fi) and stakes it in gauge to collect any available tokens and earn CRV rewards. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Curve Gauge
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://ftm.curve.fi) and stakes it in gauge to collect any available tokens and earn CRV rewards. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Curve Gauge
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur [Curve Finance](https://ftm.curve.fi) et le stake dans la jauge pour collecter tous les jetons disponibles et gagner des récompenses CRV. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token} } qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Curve Gauge
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a [Curve Finance](https://ftm.curve.fi) y lo coloca en el indicador para recolectar los tokens disponibles y ganar recompensas en CRV. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

tr.name: Curve Gauge
tr.description: [Curve Finance](https://ftm.curve.fi)'ye {{token}} tedarik eder ve mevcut jetonları toplamak ve CRV ödülleri kazanmak için bunu ölçülü olarak stake eder. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.
